abstract: China Life Insurance, the world’s biggest life insurer by market value, is interested in the Asian assets of American International Group, Reuters reported, citing a senior China Life manager briefed on the situation.
lead_paragraph: China Life Insurance, the world’s biggest life insurer by market value, is interested in the Asian assets of American International Group, Reuters reported, citing a senior China Life manager briefed on the situation.

headline.main: China Life Eyes A.I.G.’s Asian Assets, Report Says
